courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: PSYC 100; Recommended: PSYC 216 or PSYC 224.
description: Survey of changes in behavioral function in later adulthood, with emphasis on methodologies for studying aging, cognitive function, personality, social psychology, and psychopathology. Prerequisite: PSYC 100; Recommended: PSYC 216 or PSYC 224.
label: The Psychology of Aging
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to students with Senior class standing.
